mcq.statement: Choose the correct sentence: If I see him I gave him your message., If I see him I give him your message., If I see him then I will give him your message., If I see him I will be given him your message.

options.a: If I see him I gave him your message.
options.b: If I see him I give him your message.
options.c: If I see him then I will give him your message.
